## Overview
- The Add-on typically imports and enriches data from the SDK of the CSP, creating a rich data set ready for direct analysis or use in an App. The CSNF Add-on for Splunk will provide the below functionalities:
	- Collect sources data and map to the CSNF's canonical data model.
	- Categorize the data in different sourcetypes.
	- Parse the data and extract important fields.
- The example below lists the CSNF event.service.type's detected. Currently this is only showing AWS GuardDuty service types."}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"0,"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{"gutterSize":9},"structure":[{"item":"viz_H80Xj3NU","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":218}},{"item":"viz_fa495OaV","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":218,"w":375,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_wBHlEr7F","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":418,"w":375,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":618,"w":600,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_y1Ijktv3","type":"block","position":{"x":375,"y":218,"w":427,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_ZulS0m9E","type":"block","position":{"x":375,"y":418,"w":427,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":618,"w":600,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_k10BvrDI","type":"block","position":{"x":802,"y":218,"w":398,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_MGju2fpf","type":"block","position":{"x":802,"y":418,"w":398,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_table_1_new","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":918,"w":1200,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"CSNF Home","description":"Splunk Technology Add-on for the Cloud Security Notification Framework","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"tokens":{"default":{"Threat":{"value":"*"}}}}}
